name: horror game (88-two-fat-ladies)
description:
!! warning it is best if you turn your anti virus off for this game as otherwise undefined behaviour will happen !!

this is a puzzle game that can cause distress so i class it as a horror.

you need to have a good understanding of how windows works and know some basic programing !! this is essential to completing the levels.

consists of 4 levels, came up with it after the theme was announced and decided to go with it as i couldn't find a game like it.
